home.title: Building bridges between design and code
home.subtitle: I'm a design engineer, where I craft intuitive user experiences. After hours, I build my own projects.
home.featuredDescription: A comprehensive design system built to bridge the gap between design and development, featuring reusable components and clear documentation.

about.title: About
about.name: Selene Yu
about.introText1: I'm a design engineer passionate about creating seamless experiences at the intersection of design and code. With over 5 years of experience, I've worked with startups and established companies to bring their digital visions to life.
about.introText2: My approach combines technical expertise with a deep understanding of user experience. I believe that great design is not just about aesthetics—it's about creating intuitive, accessible solutions that solve real problems.
about.introText3: Currently, I'm focused on building design systems and developer tools that empower teams to work more efficiently and create better products.
about.job1Description: Leading design engineering initiatives, building scalable design systems, and bridging the gap between design and development teams. Mentoring junior engineers and establishing best practices.
about.job2Description: Developed component libraries and design systems. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ship high-quality products. Improved developer experience through better tooling.
about.job3Description: Built responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces.
about.education1Focus: Focus on Human-Computer Interaction and Software Engineering
about.skillsFrontendList: React, Vue, Svelte, TypeScript, Next.js, TailwindCSS
about.skillsDesignList: Figma, Adobe XD, Design Systems, Prototyping, UI/UX
about.skillsBackendList: Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, REST APIs, GraphQL
about.skillsToolsList: Git, Docker, AWS, Vercel, CI/CD, Testing Frameworks

projects.title: Work
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects showcasing design systems, web applications, and digital experiences I've built over the years.
projects.ctaDescription: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, and opportunities to bring your vision to life.
projects.project1Description: A comprehensive design system with documentation, components, and guidelines for building consistent digital products at scale.
projects.project2Description: Modern analytics dashboard for e-commerce platforms with real-time data visualization and insights.
projects.project3Description: Next-generation social platform focused on meaningful connections and community building.
projects.project4Description: Collaborative task management with real-time updates, team features, and project tracking.
projects.project5Description: Real-time financial tracking and analytics platform with advanced reporting capabilities.
projects.project6Description: Personal health tracking application with workout plans, nutrition guides, and progress tracking.
